

```{r}
#load to seurat
my_data_init <- curr_proc1
table(get_types(colnames((my_data_init))))

seur <- seur_find_split(CreateSeuratObject(raw.data = my_data_init), regress_cc_diff = T, do_magic = F)
seur_m <- seur_find_split(CreateSeuratObject(raw.data = my_data_init), regress_cc_diff = T, do_magic = T)
```

```{r}
curr <- seur_1_7
#temp <- MergeSeurat(seur_1_0, seur_1_1)
#temp <- seurat_analyse(temp, regress_cc_diff = F, final_analyse = T)


#plot_seur_3d(curr)

#temp <- FindAllMarkers(seur, radius = 0.3)

table(get_ident(seur), get_ident(seur_m))

#analyse current split
table(get_orig_ident(curr), get_ident(curr))
plot_tsn(curr)
plot_pca(curr)
  
cl_markers <- find_markers(curr, test.use = "MAST", logfc.threshold = 0.1, only.pos = T, min.pct = 0.8, min.diff.pct = 0.5)
plot_venn(cl_markers)
lapply(1:length(cl_markers$cluster.markers), function(i){return (array(gene_annot_convert_to(rownames(cl_markers$cluster.markers[i]$ident), "symbol")$new))})

#test GO, default params
GO_enr(cl_markers)
```
